chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms LNN n), freeVarTerms LNT n (LNN2LNT_terms n ts) = freeVarTerms LNN n ts

Premises:
freeVarTerms : forall (L : Language) (n : nat), fol.Terms L n -> list nat
Terms = fol.Terms LNT : nat -> Set Arguments Terms _%nat_scope
Module fol := Struct Record Language : Type := language { Relations : Set; Functions : Set; arity : Relations + Functions -> nat } Definition Relations : Language -> Set. Definition Functions : Language -> Set. Definition arity : forall l : Language, Relations l + Functions l -> nat. Inductive Term (L : Language) : Set := var : nat -> Term L | apply : forall f : Functions L, Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> Term L with Terms (L : Language) : nat -> Set := Tnil : Terms L 0 | Tcons : forall n : nat, Term L -> Terms L n -> Terms L (S n) Definition Term_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : Term L -> Type), (forall n : nat, P (var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : Terms
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
LNN2LNT_terms : forall n : nat, fol.Terms LNN n -> Terms n
LNT = {| Relations := Datatypes.Empty_set; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNTArity |} : Language
LNN = {| Relations := LNNRelation; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNNArity |} : Language
freeVarTermApply : forall (L : Language) (f : Functions L) (ts : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f))), freeVarTerm L (apply L f ts) = freeVarTerms L (arity L (inr f)) ts
LNN2LNT_term = fix LNN2LNT_term (t : fol.Term LNN) : Term := match t with | @fol.var _ v => var v | @apply _ f ts => apply LNT f (LNN2LNT_terms (arity LNN (inr f)) ts) end with LNN2LNT_terms (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms LNN n) {struct ts} : Terms n := match ts in (fol.Terms _ n0) return (Terms n0) with | @Tnil _ => Tnil LNT | @Tcons _ m s ss => Tcons LNT m (LNN2LNT_term s) (LNN2LNT_terms m ss) end for LNN2LNT_term : fol.Term LNN -> Term
subAllTermsId : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n), subAllTerms L n ts (fun x : nat => fol.var L x) = ts
subTermsNil : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), ~ In v (freeVarTerms L n ts) -> substituteTerms L n ts v s = ts
freeVarSubTerms4 : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v s)) -> ~ In v (freeVarTerms L n ts) -> In x (freeVarTerms L n ts)
subAllTerms_ext : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (m1 m2 : nat -> fol.Term L), (forall m : nat, In m (freeVarTerms L n ts) -> m1 m = m2 m) -> subAllTerms L n ts m1 = subAllTerms L n ts m2
freeVarSubTerms1 : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerms L n ts) -> v <> x -> In x (freeVarTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v s))
freeVarSubTerms2 : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L s) -> In v (freeVarTerms L n ts) -> In x (freeVarTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v s))
code.codeTermsInj : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat), (forall f g : Functions L, codeF f = codeF g -> f = g) -> forall (n : nat) (ts ss : fol.Terms L n), code.codeTerms L codeF n ts = code.codeTerms L codeF n ss -> ts = ss
Terms_sind : forall (L : Language) (P : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> SProp), P 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L) (t0 : fol.Terms L n), P n t0 -> P (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P n t
Terms_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Prop), P 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L) (t0 : fol.Terms L n), P n t0 -> P (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P n t
Terms_rec : forall (L : Language) (P : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Set), P 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L) (t0 : fol.Terms L n), P n t0 -> P (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P n t
Terms_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Type), P 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L) (t0 : fol.Terms L n), P n t0 -> P (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P n t
freeVarSubAllTerms1 : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v : nat), In v (freeVarTerms L n (subAllTerms L n ts m)) -> exists a : nat, In a (freeVarTerms L n ts) /\ In v (freeVarTerm L (m a))
subAllSubAllTerms : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (m1 m2 : nat -> fol.Term L), subAllTerms L n (subAllTerms L n ts m1) m2 = subAllTerms L n ts (fun n0 : nat => subAllTerm L (m1 n0) m2)
subTermsTrans : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v1 v2 : nat) (s : fol.Term L), ~ In v2 (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec v1 (freeVarTerms L n ts)) -> substituteTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v1 (fol.var L v2)) v2 s = substituteTerms L n ts v1 s
subSubAllTerms : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), substituteTerms L n (subAllTerms L n ts m) v s = subAllTerms L n ts (fun n0 : nat => substituteTerm L (m n0) v s)
freeVarSubAllTerms2 : forall (L : Language) (a : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L a) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v n : nat), In n (freeVarTerms L a ts) -> In v (freeVarTerm L (m n)) -> In v (freeVarTerms L a (subAllTerms L a ts m))
freeVarSubTerms3 : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v s)) -> In x (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec v (freeVarTerms L n ts)) \/ In x (freeVarTerm L s)
Terms_Term_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Prop) (P0 : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Prop), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L), P t -> forall t0 : fol.Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P0 n t
translateLT = fun ts : fol.Terms LNN (arity LNN (inl LT)) => let s := consTerms LNN 1 ts in sig_rec (fun _ : {t : fol.Term LNN * fol.Terms LNN 1 | Tcons LNN 1 (fst t) (snd t) = ts} => Formula) (fun (x : fol.Term LNN * fol.Terms LNN 1) (p : Tcons LNN 1 (fst x) (snd x) = ts) => prod_rec (fun x0 : fol.Term LNN * fol.Terms LNN 1 => Tcons LNN 1 (fst x0) (snd x0) = ts -> Formula) (fun (a : fol.Term LNN) (b : fol.Terms LNN 1) (_ : Tcons LNN 1 (fst (a, b)) (snd (a, b)) = ts) => let s0 := consTerms LNN 0 b...
nVars : forall (L : Language) (n : nat), fol.Terms L n * fol.Terms L n
consTerms : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (x : fol.Terms L (S n)), {t : fol.Term L * fol.Terms L n | Tcons L n (fst t) (snd t) = x}
substituteTerms : forall (L : Language) (n : nat), fol.Terms L n -> nat -> fol.Term L -> fol.Terms L n
subAllTerms : forall (L : Language) (n : nat), fol.Terms L n -> (nat -> fol.Term L) -> fol.Terms L n

```coq
intros n ts.
induction ts using Terms_ind.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite IHts. auto.
Qed.
